headline: Your Linkedin Big Sister 🏆|Growth Marketer | Helping AI and Tech brand Surpass their Marketing Target | Sharing My Professional Journey | Connecting Young Professionals to Global Opportunities
about:
I’m Blessing Ikpia, a passionate Growth Marketer with over 6 years experience , dedicated to helping AI and Tech brands scale and thrive through strategic marketing and community building. With a proven track record of creating communities of over 20,000+ members and driving impactful campaigns, I empower businesses to connect with their audience meaningfully and achieve remarkable results.

My journey began with a deep desire to inspire and uplift aspiring marketers and professionals. Over the years, I’ve worn many hats—marketer, community manager, project leader and mentor, while building a career that blends strategy, creativity, and innovation.

Some of my proudest achievements include:

Leading the Marketing team, Elite Global AI:
Successfully marketed programs that trained over 26,000 professionals in in-demand skills, secured 6,000+ participants for global AI trainings, and grew the community to 20,000+ members across platforms.

Connecting Individuals to Opportunities: Helped 3,000+ young professionals gain hands-on experience by connecting them to externship and internship roles, equipping them with the skills to thrive in competitive industries.

Empowering Professionals: Designed mentorship programs and training sessions to help individuals build personal brands, secure remote jobs and access global opportunities.

Driving Results: Led a campaign that resulted in 100,000 app downloads in 24 hours and generated my first $30,000 in sales in under a year.

Pioneering Initiatives: Currently leading "AI Women Rising," a pilot initiative empowering women in underserved communities through AI education and resources.

But my mission doesn’t stop there. I’m passionate about sharing my journey, inspiring young marketers and connecting them with the resources and strategies they need to thrive. Whether it’s through personalized marketing consulting, webinars, or mentorship programs, I’m here to help the next generation of professionals land their dream jobs and make an impact.

Let’s connect if you’re looking to grow your brand, build a thriving community or simply want to share ideas on marketing, growth, and innovation. Feel free to send a mail 💌 to ikpiablessingisioma@gmail.com

experiences.title: Marketing Director
experiences.jobDescription:
As the Marketing Director at the Elite Global AI

I Spearheaded the marketing campaigns that resulted in 6,000 participants enrolling in the Elite Global AI training programs.

I successfully expanded and grew the community to 13,000 members across all social media platforms LinkedIn, YouTube, Instagram, Facebook and X, driving engagement and increasing brand visibility.

I developed and executed comprehensive digital marketing strategies to promote AI education and professional development initiatives.

I collaborated with cross-functional teams to align marketing efforts with overall business objectives, ensuring consistent brand messaging and growth.

I leveraged analytics tools to track performance, optimize campaigns, and drive continuous improvement in outreach and conversions.

experiences.title: Founder
experiences.jobDescription:
This is a non profit organisation aimed at Empowering Marginalized Women to Lead in the Future of Work

AI Women Rising is a bold, impact-driven initiative designed to equip, elevate and empower marginalized women especially those from underserved communities with the knowledge, skills, and confidence needed to thrive in the era of Artificial Intelligence and emerging technologies.

We are not just teaching women about AI; we are preparing them to lead in tech-driven careers, create innovative solutions, and become voices of change in their local and global communities.

Key Achievements so far 

✅ Trained Over 500 Women

We’ve equipped over 500 women across underserved communities with practical AI and tech skills, many of them had zero prior experience.

✅ Launched Our Pilot Cohort in Nigeria

Our inaugural program was successfully launched in Nigeria, where we trained women from low-income backgrounds on AI fundamentals, digital literacy, and career pathways in tech.

✅ Partnership with Elite Global AI

In collaboration with Elite Global AI, we provided free access to premium courses, mentorship, and job readiness training for our participants.

✅ Delivered both Remote & Hybrid Inclusive Learning

Through mobile-friendly platforms and low-data content, we made learning accessible to women regardless of device or internet limitations.

✅ Empowered Women to Launch Their First Projects

Several participants from our first cohort have gone on to launch mini-projects, apply for remote internships, or start freelancing with confidence.

✅ Growing Community of Change-Makers

We’ve built an engaged online and offline community where women support each other, share wins, and collaborate across borders.

✅ Committed to Impact at Scale

Our 3-year vision is to empower 20,000 women globally and we’ve already taken strong steps toward making that a reality

experiences.title: Student Ambassador
experiences.jobDescription: Currently, A lead Ambassador. I have successfully onboarded more than 50 persons for the remote Externship program.

experiences.title: Insight Risk Remote Extern
experiences.jobDescription:
My Responsibilities during this Externship program:

City-Specific Market Analysis: I created a single, engaging market analysis slide that highlights the key construction projects in your assigned city, detailing their size, type, and how they align with Insight Risk's strategic goals.

Contact Verification and Enhancement: I dived into the CRM to review and update contact details for over 20 existing contacts, adding depth to my understanding of the insurance industry’s active participants.

Audience Identification: I  Identified and documented 5 new potential contacts who specialize in Builder’s Risk insurance, expanding Insight Risk's network and my professional insights.

Insights and Recommendations: I assembled a dynamic 7-10 slide presentation that synthesized my findings into actionable insights and strategic recommendations for Insight Risk.

Public Speaking & Presentation: I Produced a concise 5-minute video that captures the essence of my presentation, showcasing my ability to communicate complex information effectively and engagingly.

experiences.title: Venture Capitalist
experiences.jobDescription:
I got an Externship with HP Tech Venture via Extern as a Corporate VC and Business Analyst.

I Worked on
-Market Research
-Strategic Planning
-Data Analytics & Management
Here, I Presented and correlated the data using data visualization techniques include charts, showcasing actionable insights to drive informed decision-making. I also recommend attractive start ups for further investment due diligence.

updates.postText:
I did my international passport online WITHOUT an agent

Application took barely 10 minutes and it took about 3 weeks for my passport to be issued after capturing.

To begin your passport application
on the immigration website, you need 4 important document 

1) NIN
2) Your NPC attestation birth certificate (get this from the NPC website, 2k or 3k. Link will be in the comment) 
3) Local government identification certificate
4) Passport photograph in a white background 

✅ Go to chrome - Nigerian Immigration service 
✅ Click on Continue (if you're applying from Nigeria)
✅ Click on fresh application 
✅ Add you NiN, fill in the other details like your date of birth
✅ Click on verify 
✅ Fill in your personal details (full name, Date of Birth, Marital Status, Gender ) - click on confirm and continue 

PS- Nigeria Immigration service uses your NIN to populate your information 

Take note of the reference number just in case you stop applying mid way, you can use the reference number to continue from where you stopped 

Passport type 
✅ Type of Citizenship - Birth 
✅ Processing state - preferably your current location 
✅ Processing office- The closest immigrations office in that region 
✅ Booklet type - 5 years (32 pages), 10 years (64 pages)
✅ Fill in the form containing your personal information (occupation, maiden name, email, permanent address, next if kin)

✅ Upload all your documents in the sequence given 

✅ Passport delivery option -
Do you want to pick it up at the immigration center 

or Do you want a courier service to bring it to your location (This will attract extra charges)

✅ Go over the confirmation message to ensure that everything is on sync.

✅ Then proceed with payment using pay stack.

After payment, you can choose a date for capturing in the provided calendar 

The next stage is the capturing stage - Remember during the application, you chose a date and location where you want to be captured 

Go with the original copies of the document you uploaded, the payment slip and coloured printout of your application form (or print in a cyber cafe at the immigration centre)

After the capturing, you'll be given a small slip that you'll use for your passport collection.

3 weeks later, my passport was ready and I went to pick it up.

If you noticed, I also verified my LinkedIn 🤗

All screenshots and website link will be in the comments

Save this before it disappears 

And if I get 500 reposts, I'll be encouraged to drop a video on how you can do this step by step 

Your LinkedIn Big Sister, Blessing Ikpia
#nigerianpassport #verification

I did this ONE tiny thing and my post impressions did 60X

I used to have between 6,000 - 10,000 impressions, currently I have over 60,000 impressions.

The hack is simple. Some posts are bound to do very well on LinkedIn, it seems the algorithm favours some kind of post.

What you have to do is, include posts like this in your weekly content calendar and boom, your impressions and engagement will increase significantly.

A good example of these posts include, 'celebration post.'

You don't need to hit 20,000 followers before you celebrate, You can celebrate completing a course, Completing a project, Anything remarkable is worth celebrating.

Just add this to your content calendar and make your hooks captivating enough and you are good to go.

Here, we don't gatekeep that's why I spilled the tea. Repost ♻️ to share this update to other creators in your network.

I'll be sharing other viral strategies in the comment section.

Your LinkedIn Big Sister, Blessing Ikpia 

Happy Social Saturday.

How a mentee of mine made $2,000 per month working remotely

When She started following me on linkedin, She had zero experience, No fancy degree and no connections. Just a strong desire to learn.

I told her one thing: "The right skills will change your life."

She took action. She learnt just 2 high-income skills - Marketing and Copywriting, without spending a dime on expensive courses.

Just last month, she landed her first remote gig. Then she secured another one. Now she’s making $2,000/month.

Here’s the best part: YOU CAN DO THE SAME.

I just found a website offering over 200,000 FREE courses with certificates from prestigious schools Harvard, Stanford, MIT etc

So you have no excuse and there is no barrier, Just opportunities waiting for you to grab them 😊

https://lnkd.in/dTfZuGkm

And if you know someone trying to escape low-paying jobs and build a high-income career; kindly REPOST to help them out.

Seeing me for the first time, I'm your linkedin Big sister Blessing Ikpia, a Growth Marketer. I have made it my Life's mission to empower young professionals seeking Global opportunities in their career. If this is your thing, follow for more😊

Still in the spirit of celebration, Cheers to 4,000 LinkedIn Followers, not just in numbers but IMPACT (like the story I shared above) 🥂 

#yourlinkedinbigsister #Growth

To my own people, my LinkedIn Family 😊

It’s My Birthday😊

or should I say 'OUR BIRTHDAY'😂

A few years ago, I was just a young woman with big dreams, unsure of where to start. I knew I wanted more, more impact, more growth and more opportunities. But I didn’t have all the answers.

Fast forward to today, and I’m living proof that consistency, courage and community can change your life.

In the past year alone:
✅ I built and led communities of over 20,000+ professionals
✅ Helped 6,000+ people gain hands-on experience through AI training
✅ Started a master’s program while juggling multiple projects
✅ Completed 54 courses & earned certifications
✅ Worked with Fortune 500 companies in internships & externships
✅ Generated my first $25,000 in sales
✅ Ran a campaign that resulted in 100,000 downloads in 24 hours
✅ Mentored aspiring marketers & young professionals
✅ Grew my personal brand & launched a newsletter with 4,000+ subscribers
✅ Launched the AI Women Rising 

But beyond the numbers, this year has been about evolution, stepping into new roles, embracing challenges and refusing to shrink myself to fit into small spaces.

As your linkedin big sister, I’ve learned that impact is bigger than titles or achievements. It’s about showing up, creating opportunities and lifting others as you grow. Your success and wins since I started sharing tips and access to global opportunities opportunity has kept me going, your testimonies have been a great source of motivation.

Thank you for giving me a community, thank you for engaging with my posts, YOU ARE THE REASON I SHOW UP, I love you guys 😊

To everyone who has supported me whether through words of encouragement, a shared post, a referral, or just believing in me, THANK YOU 😊. Your support fuels my drive to do more.

So here’s to another year of growth, impact and breaking more barriers

If you’ve been part of my journey, drop a comment, Let’s celebrate together☺️

#yourlinkedinbigsister #Gratitude #linkedin

Starting my Master's program with Nexford University!

To my amazing linkedin community, Happy New Month🤗

As I step into a new chapter, I reflect on last month's triumphs:

✅ Took 25 marketing courses (knowledge powerhouse!)
✅ Launched a marketing campaign that drew 100,000+ signups in 24 hours (This particular project almost took my life because of the tight deadline😂, I literally spent 36 straight hours working on this)
✅ Created 23 engaging LinkedIn posts with really amazing engagement and I gained 1,000+ new followers
✅ Read 5 books 📚 
✅ Had 2 speaking engagement 
✅ To crown it all, I had a call with a marketing legend, Seth Godin!

Now, I embark on another exciting journey:

Starting my Master's program with Nexford University

To everyone pushing boundaries, I see you!

Keep going, keep growing. Celebrate your wins, no matter how small. Embrace challenges and always remember that 

Every late night
Every early dawn
Every obstacle you overcome, makes you stronger.

If you're growth oriented and you are looking for platforms to take courses and get certificates, you can check out HP LIFE's  course, which is from the HP Foundation
(I will share the link in the comment section)

Here's to an extraordinary month ahead!

Follow Ikpia Blessing Isioma  and share this information to your network 

#NewMonth #NewBeginnings #GrowthMindset #Achievements #Marketing #PersonalGrowth #Education #NexfordUniversity #SethGodin #KeepGoing #KeepGrowing"

recommendationsReceived.name: Esther Okpor
recommendationsReceived.subtitle: Graphic & Motion Designer | Branding | Motion Design | Social Media Design | Visual Identity | I Help Startups, Personal brands | Founders & CEOs Look Professional Online | Check out my portfolio below
recommendationsReceived.description:
Working with Blessing Ikpia has been one of the most transformational experiences of my career journey.

I joined her 8-week mentorship program simply hoping to learn a few LinkedIn tricks, but I left with so much more: clarity, confidence, and a renewed sense of purpose.

Blessing isn’t just a LinkedIn coach. She’s a powerhouse of wisdom, intentionality, and genuine care. She doesn’t hold back what she knows, and she pushes you (graciously but firmly) to show up as your best self.

Every week with her felt like a mindset shift. She taught us how to build powerful personal brands, not just through strategy, but through integrity, excellence, and presence.

If you’ve ever thought of working with her, don’t think twice. Blessing is a light and a gift to this generation.

I’m truly grateful for her investment in me, and I highly recommend her to anyone serious about growth on LinkedIn and beyond.

recommendations.name: Esther Okpor
recommendations.subtitle: Graphic & Motion Designer | Branding | Motion Design | Social Media Design | Visual Identity | I Help Startups, Personal brands | Founders & CEOs Look Professional Online | Check out my portfolio below
recommendations.description:
Esther is one of the most driven, creative, and resourceful professionals I’ve ever had the pleasure of mentoring.

Throughout my 8-week mentorship program, she stood out not just for her consistency, but for her incredible ability to turn ideas into impactful design solutions. She didn’t just participate, she led with energy, supported others, and showed up every single time.

Beyond her top-notch design skills (from LinkedIn banners to profile revamps and more), Esther understands strategy. She knows how to position a brand visually in a way that attracts opportunities and builds trust, something most designers overlook.

Her dedication to excellence and her eye for detail make her an asset to any team or personal brand looking to elevate their presence online.

I highly recommend Esther to anyone who wants to transform their brand and stand out with confidence. She’s not just a designer, she’s a brand partner who truly cares about helping people grow.
